verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H935><s%>, When you be come into the land <S%H776><s%> of your habitations <S%H4186><s%>, which I give unto you <S%H5414><s%>,

And will make <S%H6213><s%> an offering by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, or a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> in performing <S%H6381><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%>, or in a freewill offering <S%H5071><s%>, or in your solemn feasts <S%H4150><s%>, to make <S%H6213><s%> a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, of the herd <S%H1241><s%>, or of the flock <S%H6629><s%>:

Then shall he that offereth <S%H7126><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> bring <S%H7126><s%> a food offering <S%H4503><s%> of a tenth deal <S%H6241><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> for a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> shall you prepare <S%H6213><s%> with the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> or sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>, for one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%>.

Or for a ram <S%H352><s%>, you shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> for a food offering <S%H4503><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with the third <S%H7992><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And for a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%>, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And when you preparest <S%H6213><s%> a bullock <S%H1121><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, or for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> in performing <S%H6381><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%>, or peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>:

Then shall he bring <S%H7126><s%> with a bullock <S%H1241><s%> a food offering <S%H4503><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with half <S%H2677><s%> an hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> for a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> an hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%>, for an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
Thus shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H7794><s%>, or for one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, or for a lamb <S%H3532><s%>, or a kid <S%H5795><s%>.
According to the number <S%H4557><s%> that you shall prepare <S%H6213><s%>, so <S%H3602><s%> shall you do <S%H6213><s%> to every one <S%H259><s%> according to their number <S%H4557><s%>.

All that are born of the country <S%H249><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> these things after this manner <S%H7126><s%>, in offering an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And if a stranger <S%H1616><s%> sojourn <S%H1481><s%> with you <S%H8432><s%>, or whoever be among you in your generations <S%H1755><s%>, and will offer <S%H6213><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; as you do <S%H6213><s%>, so he shall do <S%H6213><s%>.

One <S%H259><s%> ordinance <S%H2708><s%> shall be both for you of the congregation <S%H6951><s%>, and also for the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that stays <S%H1481><s%> with you <S%H2708><s%>, an ordinance for ever <S%H5769><s%> in your generations <S%H1755><s%>: as you are <S%H1616><s%>, so shall the stranger be before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
One <S%H259><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> manner <S%H4941><s%> shall be for you <S%H1616><s%>, and for the stranger that stays with you <S%H1481><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H935><s%>, When you come into the land <S%H776><s%> where I bring you <S%H935><s%>,
Then it shall be <S%H398><s%>, that, when you eat of the bread <S%H3899><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, you shall offer up <S%H7311><s%> an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

You shall offer up <S%H7311><s%> a cake <S%H2471><s%> of the first <S%H7225><s%> of your dough <S%H6182><s%> for an heave offering <S%H8641><s%>: as you do the heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of the threshingfloor <S%H1637><s%>, so shall you heave it <S%H7311><s%>.
Of the first <S%H7225><s%> of your dough <S%H6182><s%> you shall give <S%H5414><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> in your generations <S%H1755><s%>.
And if you have erred <S%H7686><s%>, and not observed <S%H6213><s%> all these commandments <S%H4687><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>,

Even all that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, from the day <S%H3117><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H1973><s%>, and from now on among your generations <S%H1755><s%>;

Then it shall be <S%H6213><s%>, if anything be committed by ignorance <S%H7684><s%> outside the knowledge <S%H5869><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, that all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, with his food offering <S%H4503><s%>, and his drink offering <S%H5262><s%>, according to the manner <S%H4941><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> them <S%H7684><s%>; for it is ignorance: and they shall bring <S%H935><s%> their offering <S%H7133><s%>, a sacrifice made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and their sin offering <S%H2403><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, for their ignorance <S%H7684><s%>:

And it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that stays <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them <S%H5971><s%>; seeing all the people were in ignorance <S%H7684><s%>.

And if any <S%H259><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> through ignorance <S%H7684><s%>, then he shall bring <S%H7126><s%> a she goat <S%H5795><s%> of the first <S%H1323><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the soul <S%H5315><s%> that sins ignorantly <S%H7683><s%>, when he sins <S%H2398><s%> by ignorance <S%H7684><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him <S%H5545><s%>; and it shall be forgiven him.

You shall have one <S%H259><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> for him that sins <S%H6213><s%> through ignorance <S%H7684><s%>, both for him that is born <S%H249><s%> among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and for the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that stays <S%H1481><s%> among them <S%H8432><s%>.

But the soul <S%H5315><s%> that does <S%H6213><s%> anything presumptuously <S%H7311><s%>, whether he be born in the land <S%H249><s%>, or a stranger <S%H4480><s%>, the same blasphemes <S%H1442><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>.

Because he has despised <S%H959><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and has broken <S%H6565><s%> his commandment <S%H4687><s%>, that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall utterly <S%H3772><s%> be cut off <S%H3772><s%>; his iniquity shall be upon him <S%H5771><s%>.

And while the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, they found <S%H4672><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> that gathered <S%H7197><s%> sticks <S%H6086><s%> upon the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And they that found <S%H4672><s%> him gathering <S%H7197><s%> sticks <S%H6086><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> him unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>.
And they put <S%H3240><s%> him in custody <S%H4929><s%>, because it was not declared <S%H6567><s%> what should be done to him <S%H6213><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, The man <S%H376><s%> shall be surely <S%H4191><s%> put to death <S%H4191><s%>: all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> him with stones <S%H68><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

And all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> him outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and stoned <S%H7275><s%> him with stones <S%H68><s%>, and he died <S%H4191><s%>; as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and bid <S%H559><s%> them that they make <S%H6213><s%> them fringes <S%H6734><s%> in the borders <S%H3671><s%> of their garments <S%H899><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%>, and that they put <S%H5414><s%> upon the fringe <S%H6734><s%> of the borders <S%H3671><s%> a cord <S%H6616><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>:

And it shall be unto you for a fringe <S%H6734><s%>, that you may look <S%H7200><s%> upon it <S%H2142><s%>, and remember all the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H8446><s%>; and that you seek not after <S%H310><s%> your own heart <S%H3824><s%> and your own eyes <S%H5869><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> which you use to go a whoring <S%H2181><s%>:
That you may remember <S%H2142><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> all my commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and be <S%H1961><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%> unto your God <S%H430><s%>.

I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which brought you out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to be your God <S%H430><s%>: I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
